Title: Landscaping Northumberland Road / Falmouth Crescent - Brinnington
Description: Stockport Homes is seeking a contractor to carry out landscaping works to the rear of 4 no. low rise blocks in Brinnington. The works will include removing existing hard landscaping and reinstating with a mixture of tarmac paths and new areas of grass. Other work elements will include removing 2 no. trees, reforming access steps, erecting fencing and installing rotary dryers

Title: Coalshaw Green Park MUGA Works
Description:
The proposal is to refurbish the existing sports courts facility at Coalshaw Green Park, Chadderton, Oldham OL9 8JW 
Sitting in the centre of a popular urban Park and less than a minutes? walk from the new Metrolink South Chadderton tram stop the site offers potential for further improvement. Currently offering 7a side football, basketball and tennis courts it is acknowledged that the facility now requires refurbishment to develop and encourage further usage. To enable us to encourage more sports users the proposals include for a multi-use football / basketball enclosed court, tennis court and additional netball court.   
Adjacent to the sports courts is a recently refurbished wheeled sports area (skateboard / rollerblade / bmx) and the site is also in close proximity to the children?s play area. 

Funding has been secured from a number of sources towards the cost of providing refurbishment to this sports /games facility.
Additional Text:
All information and documentation on the Chest.

Please note this opportunity has been awarded and is now closed. 
All documentation on the Chest.

Title: Framework Agreement for General Landscaping Works and / or the Fabrication and Installation of Metal Railings / Gates plus the Installation of Fencing
Description: To facilitate delivery of Neighbourhood Investment Work, Stockport Homes is seeking suitably qualified contractors to secure a place on our new framework agreement for General Landscaping Works and / or the Fabrication and Installation of Metal Railings / Gates plus the installation of Fencing. The framework is anticipated to run for a period of four years from 01/04/2018 - 31/03/2022. The overall approximate value of the contract is Â£2,500.000. Works will predominately be to areas around Stockport Homes properties, however there may be opportunities to carry out works for schools within the Borough.
